üè†‚òÄÔ∏è Hot weather keeping you indoors? Take advantage of this time to freshen up your home with some deep cleaning! As we enjoy the summer heat and look forward to the cooler fall months, it's the perfect opportunity to tackle those cleaning tasks that often get overlooked. Not only will a thorough clean make your living space more enjoyable, but it can also help maintain your home's condition. Here are a few tips to get started: Declutter and Organize: Start with areas like closets, basements, and garages. Deep Clean Carpets and Rugs: Remove dust and allergens. Check for Mold and Mildew: Especially in damp areas like bathrooms and basements. Inspect Windows and Doors: Ensure they are properly sealed and clean. üè°Remember, a well-maintained home not only provides comfort but also preserves your investment. Need a professional inspection to ensure everything is in top shape? Contact me today to schedule a comprehensive home inspection! Inspector Mark https://lnkd.in/gskiThtZ #HomeInspection #SummerCleaning #HomeMaintenance #FallPreparation

Mold Removal vs. Mold Remediation: What's the Difference? ü¶† Mold Removal involves physically removing visible signs of mold contamination from surfaces like walls, ceilings, and floors. It's a good first step in getting rid of the immediate problem. However, for a more comprehensive solution, Mold Remediation is key. It not only removes visible mold but also addresses underlying causes to prevent future growth. This can include air quality testing, better ventilation, and even repairs to sources of moisture. With Mold Remediation, ServiceMaster Restore goes the extra mile to ensure your home or business is not just mold-free now, but for the long term! ‚è≥ Let's keep your home safe and healthy. Contact us to learn more about our Mold Restoration services. https://lnkd.in/gdmWCU7N
